description: Developed for mountain and adventure skiing, this jacket meets the requirements of touring. Minimal design and high performance Xpore material in waterproofing and breathability, it is the Black Crows product for the most demanding climbs. The Freebird Xpore is the perfect balance between lightness, comfort and durability, with simple outer layer in contrast with the Freebird inner yellow, crossed by multiple chevron waterproofing strips, it will satisfy lovers of beautiful views looking for an ultra-technical suit with a Black Crows aesthetic.
name: Black Crows Freebird Xpore Jacket - Mens
